official-title.#text:
To prevent the implementation of certain tax and fee
		  provisions of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act until the
		  Secretary of the Treasury certifies that reporting requirements relating to
		  employer status and employee income levels and health care status may be made
		  with 100 percent accuracy and without fraud.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on

, for
			 a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for
			 consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the
			 committee concerned

short-title.#text:
No Taxation Without Verification Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(including any amendments
			 therein) shall be implemented for any period before the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, or the Secretary’s designee, certifies that the reporting
			 requirements relating to employer status and employee income levels and health
			 care status may be made with 100 percent accuracy and without fraud.

text.#text:
No tax or fee imposed

			 the

header.#text:
Certification
